Lyrics: Mery yt ys whil sumer ylast
Direct Translation: Merry it is while summer lasts
Poetic Translation: Merry it is while summer lasts

Direct Translation: Ah! Now approach blasts of wind
Poetic Translation: But then comes the cold wind's blast

Lyrics: Ey! Ey! What this night is long
Direct Translation: Ay! Ay! This night is so long
Poetic Translation: Ei, ei! how this night is long,

Lyrics: And I wit wel muchel wrong,
Direct Translation: And I, having been done much wrong,
Poetic Translation: And I, being done great wrong,
